about_the_game:
Gear up for critical situations and support your teammates with the Tactical Doc Gear Set for the Security team.

Contains six different cosmetic gear pieces:

- Tactical Doc Hat
- Tactical Doc Mask
- Tactical Doc Top
- Tactical Doc Bottom
- Tactical Doc Gloves
- Tactical Doc Boots

These items are unlocked in-game immediately upon purchase and can be combined with other cosmetic gear pieces. They can be equipped in-game in the Customization menu, which can be accessed from the Main menu.

The Tactical Doc Gear Set is included in the Resurgence Set Bundle.
